Initially pitched as a creators hub akin to Pixiv for the Anime Western audience, GoBoiano has evolved into a web media platform that delivers news and entertainment for Anime & Japanese culture.

    Maj Mack
    http://goboiano.com/
    Jan - Oct 2014
